name: BeerMeister
0:
”Alexa, open Beer Meister and surprise me.”
”Alexa, tell Beer Meister I feel like a porter.”
”Alexa, ask Beer Meister to suggest an ale.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beer meister
des: The Beer Meister suggests beer from an eclectic list of brews based on the style criteria that you provide. This is not intended for people under the age of 21 and I cannot necessarily recommend it for people above that age either.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
